mapper.sql: create_user, create_time, modify_user, modify_time, is_deleted, id, user_id, file_name, file_uuid, file_suffix, file_size, file_type, file_url, status
mapper.select: SELECT t1.* FROM ( SELECT cf.id, cf.user_id, cf.file_name, cf.file_suffix, cf.file_type, cf.file_size, cf.file_url, cf.status, cm.target_id, cj.job_fair_title FROM crim_file cf LEFT JOIN crim_mount cm ON cf.id = cm.file_id AND cm.is_deleted = 0 AND cm.target_type = 0 LEFT JOIN crim_job_fair cj ON cm.target_id = cj.id AND cj.is_deleted = 0 WHERE cf.is_deleted = 0 AND cf.file_type = 2 ) t1 ${ew.customSqlSegment}
